trans-unit.source: How your Android users get their apps | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: How your Android users get their apps | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: Methods for making Android apps available to end users
trans-unit.target: Methods for making Android apps available to end users

trans-unit.source: How your Android users get their apps
trans-unit.target: How your Android users get their apps

trans-unit.source: Use this information to understand how and where your Android end users get the apps that you distribute through Microsoft Intune.
trans-unit.target: Use this information to understand how and where your Android end users get the apps that you distribute through Microsoft Intune.

trans-unit.source: The information can be different for native Android devices versus Samsung Knox devices.
trans-unit.target: The information can be different for native Android devices versus Samsung Knox devices.

trans-unit.source: Native (non-Samsung Knox) Android devices
trans-unit.target: Native (non-Samsung Knox) Android devices

trans-unit.source: App type
trans-unit.target: App type

trans-unit.source: Line-of-business (LOB) apps
trans-unit.target: Line-of-business (LOB) apps

trans-unit.source: Play Store apps
trans-unit.target: Play Store apps

trans-unit.source: Available apps
trans-unit.target: Available apps

trans-unit.source: Users tap **install** in the Company Portal.
trans-unit.target: Users tap **install** in the Company Portal.

trans-unit.source: A notification appears, which users then tap to start the installation.
trans-unit.target: A notification appears, which users then tap to start the installation.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.

trans-unit.source: Users tap the app in the Company Portal and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.
trans-unit.target: Users tap the app in the Company Portal and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.

trans-unit.source: Required apps
trans-unit.target: Required apps

trans-unit.source: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.
trans-unit.target: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.

trans-unit.source: Users tap the notification to start the installation.
trans-unit.target: Users tap the notification to start the installation.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.

trans-unit.source: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.
trans-unit.target: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.

trans-unit.source: Users tap the notification and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.
trans-unit.target: Users tap the notification and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.

trans-unit.source: Samsung Knox Android devices
trans-unit.target: Samsung Knox Android devices

trans-unit.source: App type
trans-unit.target: App type

trans-unit.source: Line-of-business (LOB) apps
trans-unit.target: Line-of-business (LOB) apps

trans-unit.source: Play Store apps
trans-unit.target: Play Store apps

trans-unit.source: Available apps
trans-unit.target: Available apps

trans-unit.source: Users tap **install** in the Company Portal.
trans-unit.target: Users tap **install** in the Company Portal.

trans-unit.source: The app installs without further user intervention.
trans-unit.target: The app installs without further user intervention.

trans-unit.source: Users tap the app in the Company Portal and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.
trans-unit.target: Users tap the app in the Company Portal and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.

trans-unit.source: Required apps
trans-unit.target: Required apps

trans-unit.source: The app is installed without any user intervention.
trans-unit.target: The app is installed without any user intervention.

trans-unit.source: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.
trans-unit.target: Users are shown a notification, which they cannot dismiss, indicating that they need to install an app.

trans-unit.source: Users tap the notification and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.
trans-unit.target: Users tap the notification and are taken to an app page in the Play Store, where they can start the installation.

trans-unit.source: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.
trans-unit.target: After the installation is successful, the notification disappears.

trans-unit.source: Apps can be managed or unmanaged, as described below.
trans-unit.target: Apps can be managed or unmanaged, as described below.

trans-unit.source: The process of making apps managed is the same for all types of Android devices.
trans-unit.target: The process of making apps managed is the same for all types of Android devices.

trans-unit.source: **Managed apps** - Apps that can be managed through policies and that have been "wrapped" by Intune or have been built with the Intune Mobile Application Management (MAM) Software Development Kit (SDK).
trans-unit.target: **Managed apps** - Apps that can be managed through policies and that have been "wrapped" by Intune or have been built with the Intune Mobile Application Management (MAM) Software Development Kit (SDK).

trans-unit.source: These apps can be managed by Intune, and application policies can be applied to them.
trans-unit.target: These apps can be managed by Intune, and application policies can be applied to them.

trans-unit.source: **Unmanaged apps** - Apps that can be managed through policies and that have not been wrapped by Intune or that do not incorporate the Intune MAM SDK.
trans-unit.target: **Unmanaged apps** - Apps that can be managed through policies and that have not been wrapped by Intune or that do not incorporate the Intune MAM SDK.

trans-unit.source: Application policies cannot be applied to these apps.
trans-unit.target: Application policies cannot be applied to these apps.
